prompts: Create a mechanical Pokemon that resembles gears and has a sleek metallic finish.
Imagine a steel-type Pokemon with intricate designs and glowing accents.
Generate a Pokemon that represents innovation and technology with a shiny surface.
Show me a Pokemon that combines machine elements with an industrial theme.
Design a unique Pokemon that features multiple gears and has a cool blue color scheme.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the concept of machinery and movement, with a futuristic look.
Give me a Pokemon that is both powerful and elegant, resembling a complex machine.

distinctive_features: Two large gears on its head
Small arms extending from the sides
